statements: SELECT * FROM named_entities;
SELECT named_entity_id, named_entity_name FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_type='person';
SELECT named_entity_type, COUNT(*) AS entity_count FROM named_entities GROUP BY named_entity_type;
SELECT named_entity_name FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM named_entities ORDER BY named_entity_type ASC, named_entity_name DESC;
SELECT named_entity_name, named_entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_type = 'Person' ORDER BY named_entity_name DESC;
SELECT named_entity_name, named_entity_type, text_data FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_type = 'Organization' ORDER BY named_entity_name ASC;
SELECT named_entity_name, named_entity_type, text_data FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_type = 'Location' ORDER BY named_entity_name ASC, named_entity_type ASC;
SELECT named_entity_name, named_entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_type IN ('Person', 'Organization') ORDER BY named_entity_type ASC, named_entity_name ASC;
SELECT named_entity_name, named_entity_type, text_data FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity_type = 'Person' OR named_entity_type = 'Location' ORDER BY named_entity_type DESC, named_entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities;
SELECT entity_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM named_entities GROUP BY entity_name;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'person';
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM named_entities ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE entity_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT data_id, text_data FROM entity_text_data WHERE entity_id = 2 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Organization' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM entity_text_data WHERE entity_id = 3 ORDER BY data_id ASC, text_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT entity_name, location FROM named_entities ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_text FROM text_documents WHERE doc_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT entity_name, doc_text FROM named_entities JOIN entity_mentions ON named_entities.id = entity_mentions.entity_id ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT entity_name, location FROM named_entities WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT entity_name, COUNT(*) AS num_mentions FROM named_entities INNER JOIN entity_mentions ON named_entities.id = entity_mentions.entity_id GROUP BY entity_name HAVING num_mentions > 5;

SELECT entity_name, location, doc_text FROM named_entities INNER JOIN entity_mentions ON named_entities.id = entity_mentions.entity_id INNER JOIN text_documents ON entity_mentions.doc_id = text_documents.doc_id WHERE entity_name LIKE 'A%' AND doc_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY doc_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM NamedEntities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_type='Person';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM NamedEntities JOIN EntitiesLocation ON NamedEntities.entity_id = EntitiesLocation.entity_id;
SELECT * FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_id = 1;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT entity_id, location_id, location_name FROM NamedEntities JOIN EntitiesLocation ON NamedEntities.entity_id = EntitiesLocation.entity_id;
SELECT entity_id_1, entity_id_2, relation_type FROM EntityRelations WHERE relation_type = 'family';
SELECT text_id, entity_id, text_date FROM TextData ORDER BY text_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM NamedEntities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT doc_title, doc_content FROM TextDocuments ORDER BY doc_id DESC;
SELECT tag_name, tag_category FROM EntityTags WHERE tag_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT entity_id1, entity_id2, relation_type FROM EntityRelations WHERE relation_type = 'related';
SELECT * FROM NamedEntities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Person' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT doc_title, doc_id FROM TextDocuments WHERE doc_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY doc_title DESC;
SELECT entity_id1, entity_id2, relation_type FROM EntityRelations WHERE relation_type = 'Related' ORDER BY entity_id1;
SELECT DISTINCT entity_name, entity_type FROM NamedEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Organization';
